H0.text: With what orchestral instrument would you associate Yo- Yo Ma. Violin

H1.text: With what orchestral instrument would you associate Yo- Yo Ma. Double Bass

H2.text: With what orchestral instrument would you associate Yo- Yo Ma. Harp

H3.text: With what orchestral instrument would you associate Yo- Yo Ma. CELLO

A4.text: Yo-Yo Ma is a cellist who began studying the cello with his father at age four.

A5.text: Yo-Yo Ma's primary performance instrument is the Davidov cello, made in 1712 by Antonio Stradivari.
